name: Dr. Ick
description:
Deep deep down, far below the earths crust and farther still beyond your comprehension, a creature stirs. That creature is Dr. Ick! Scientist extraordinaire and five time horseshoes champion (she really got an arm on her). Someone has donked up her dang laboratory and her beautiful children are running amuck. Dr.Ick needs to get to the bottom of and then throw chemicals at whoever is responsible!

WASD to move, LCTRL to fire, Spacebar to jump.

Made as a part of Metroidvania Month XV
